Requetes.Description: Nombre de nouveaux documents inseres de la semaine dernieere
Requetes.Requete: SELECT DOCUMENT_NAME, CREATION_DATE, DATE_CREATE FROM [SFT].[DOCUMENTS] WHERE DATE_CREATE >= DATEADD(wk, DATEDIFF(wk, 6, GETDATE()), 0) and DATE_CREATE <= DATEADD(wk, DATEDIFF(wk, 6, GETDATE()), 6)
select MEETING_NAME, MEETING_DESCRIPTION, MEETING_DATE from SFT.MEETINGS WHERE MEETING_DATE >= CONVERT(DATE, GETDATE()) and MEETING_DATE < DATEADD(D, 1, CONVERT(DATE, GETDATE()))

Requetes.Description: Nom de la compagnie du client 'test_client.amundi_is'
Requetes.Requete: SELECT ENTREPRISE_NAME FROM [SFT].[ENTREPRISE_INFO] ei inner join SFT.ENTREPRISES e on e.ID_ENTREPRISE_INFO = ei.ID_ENTREPRISE_INFO inner join SFT.ENTREPRISE_CONTACT ec on ec.ID_ENTREPRISE = e.ID_ENTREPRISE inner join SFT.CONTACTS c on c.ID_CONTACT = ec.ID_CONTACT WHERE CONTACT_NAME = 'test_client.amundi_is'

Requetes.Description: Liste des fonds de la base SARA

Requetes.description: Liste des types de fonds de la base SARA

Requetes.Description: Liste des fonds de BASEVL dans la base SARA

Requetes.description: Liste n2 des fonds de BASEVL dans la base SARA
Requetes.Requete: SELECT F.[FUND_CODE], F.[KONDOR_CODE], F.[FULLNAME] AS 'FUND_NAME', F.[DEVISE_NM], P.[FUND_CODE] AS 'FUND_PARENT_CODE', P.[FULLNAME] AS 'FUND_PARENT_NAME', RP.REGISTRATION_PLACE_NAME, FT.FUND_TYPE_FULLNAME, FTS.FUND_TYPE_STRATEGY FROM [GHB].[BASEVL].[REF_BASEVL_FUND] F LEFT JOIN [GHB].[BASEVL].[REF_REGISTRATION_PLACE] RP ON RP.REGISTRATION_PLACE_ID = F.REGISTRATION_PLACE_ID LEFT JOIN [GHB].[BASEVL].[REF_FUND_TYPE] FT ON FT.FUND_TYPE_ID = F.FUND_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN [GHB].[BASEVL].[REF_FUND_TYPE_STRATEGY] FTS ON FTS.FUND_TYPE_STRATEGY_ID = F.FUND_TYPE_STRATEGY_ID LEFT JOIN [GHB].[BASEVL].[REF_BASEVL_FUND] P ON P.GHB_FUND_PARENT_ID = F.GHB_FUND_ID ORDER BY F.[FULLNAME]
